proposal.personalizedPitch:
I came across Creseada International Limited while researching logistics & supply chain companies and noticed room to enhance user engagement through real-time features.

I'm David Ariyo, a Full Stack Developer specializing in real-time applications. I work with companies in logistics & supply chain to solve technical challenges through custom development.

I spotted several areas where custom development could help:

1. Logistics operations could benefit from real-time tracking and management systems
2. Customer portal for shipment tracking and status updates
3. Custom team communication platform could improve collaboration

Recent relevant projects:
• Dassage - Real-time messaging platform with video calls and file sharing
• Full MERN stack development (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js)
• Cloud deployment and authentication systems

Would you like to explore this further?

Best regards,
